Name: Puzzle Light: Connect
About the game: Puzzle Light: Connect is a logic game. Connect the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game. 50 hand-crafted levels; A fun puzzle game (even for those who have no knowledge of electronic circuits);
